verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I don't want to get there
At the end of it all
Looking behind me
To see there was so much more

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Take this pocketful of faith
It is all I have today
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You will always have my heart
Everyday I'll trust You more, oh God
Take this pocketful of faith
It is all I have today
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Leaving the safety
Here at the shore
Beyond the horizon
I see there is so much more

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Take this pocketful of faith
It is all I have today
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You will always have my heart
Everyday I'll trust You more, oh God
Take this pocketful of faith
It is all I have today
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Anywhere You go I'll follow
When You call my name I'll run
Lead me on into tomorrow
Light my way like the rising sun
Anywhere You go I'll follow
When You call my name I'll run
Lead me on into tomorrow
Light my way like the rising sun
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Anywhere You go I'll follow
When You call my name I'll run
Lead me on into tomorrow
Light my way like the rising sun
Anywhere You go I'll follow
When You call my name I'll run
Lead me on into tomorrow
Light my way like the rising sun
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
I'm giving it all
